query:
SELECT s.id,
                       COALESCE(t.name_en, s.name) AS name,
                       s.scientific_name,
                       s.observed_at,
                       s.latitude,
                       s.longitude
                FROM species s
                LEFT JOIN species_translations t ON s.scientific_name = t.scientific_name
                WHERE s.scientific_name = $1
                ORDER BY s.observed_at DESC
